name: The Haunted Carnival
description:
The Haunted Carnival is a text adventure inspired by the original Scott Adams adventures from the early 8-bit era. 

It uses a custom VERB/NOUN parser written in JavaScript.

Ratings

Challenge Level:  2 out of 5 (Medium Easy)

Estimated Time: 60-90 minutes

Age Level:  Okay for Kids.  (It has ghosts, but it's not scary.)
